name: Alberta Survey, 1994

creator.name: Population Research Laboratory
creator.affiliation: Department of Sociology, University of Alberta

author.name: Population Research Laboratory
author.affiliation: Department of Sociology, University of Alberta

description: The 1994 Alberta Survey (AS) was the eighth annual provincial survey administered by the Department of Sociology, University of Alberta, through its research facility, the Population Research Laboratory (PRL)--major topics included in this survey: demographics, health, television viewing, political/social attitudes, AIDS, support group affiliation, and fertility. This random sample survey of households in the province of Alberta has enabled academic researchers, local community agencies, and government departments to explore a broad spectrum of social issues in an on-going research framework.
